body.name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Face Moisturizer Gel-Cream to Hydrate and Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, 1.7 oz
features: 1.7-ounce jar of Neutrogena Hydro Boost Daily gel-cream face moisturizer with hyaluronic acid quenches extra-dry skin
Daily hydrating face moisturizer features a non-comedogenic formula that is oil-free, dye-free, and fragrance-free and is from a dermatologist-recommended brand
The rich face lotion relieves intense dryness by providing long-lasting moisturizing power. This hyaluronic acid moisturizer is the perfect addition to your at-home hydrating self-care routine
body.description: Product Description Use Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Gel-Cream Moisturizer to instantly quench and provide long-lasting moisture relief for your extra-dry skin. This daily facial lotion helps quench extra-dry skin and keeps it looking smooth, supple, and hydrated day after day. The unique gel-cream formula absorbs quickly like a gel, and has the long lasting moisturizing power of a cream. It is formulated with hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin, attracts moisture and locks it in. This moisturizer formula for dry skin results in more supple, healthy-looking, and smooth looking skin. From a Dermatologist Recommended Brand, this gel-cream face lotion is oil-, dye-, and fragrance-free and non-comedogenic. It can be worn alone or under makeup. Add this hyaluronic acid gel cream moisturizer to your daily at-home hydrating self care routine Brand Story By Neutrogena

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: To Use: Apply evenly to face and neck after cleansing. Wear it alone or under makeup as a moisturizer Lightweight: The unique gel-cream formula absorbs into skin quickly like a gel but has the lasting moisturizing power of a cream Results: Instantly quenches dry skin and keeps it glowing day after day. Increases skin’s hydration and locks it in 3X Hydrating Power: Pair this gel-cream with Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Serum for 3X the hydrating power.* *Based on hydrating ingredients vs gel cream alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this stuff.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the 1.7 oz, of Extra-Dry Skin gel-cream. I honestly was seriously skeptical about buying this. For the first time ever, the skin on my face just absolutely dried up. It was seriously dry and at the time I feared it was psoriasis. I originally was using just some random lotion (body lotion to be exact), and then I bought some off brand cetaphil. That only put a layer on my face that went away quickly. As a college student that lacks money, I was really skeptical because I didn't want to buy crap that was $14 and have it not work, but my skin got so bad that I would try anything. The box and everything came in tact. At first I tried it, it did burn. I can't contribute it to the ingredients in the bottle because previously I had basically just stripped my skin of everything that almost anything put on my face, even if it was meant to be soothing, burned. I continued with putting it on my face when I felt it was extremely dry, so usually mornings when I wake up, right after classes (which is usually around 3-4 hours later, and then right after my shower (since I exfoliate). Now it is not completely "long lasting". I do have to reapply a few times a day, but in the long run, I have noticed that my skin has become a lot more moist and "plump" compared to what it was before. Before I rubbed my face and it sounded like sandpaper and felt even worse. Now my skin feels amazing, my face no longer burns when I apply this stuff, and overall it really does give a cool refreshing feeling. There really is no smell to it, unless you are super super sensitive to smells and directly sniffed the cream then I guess you could say it is "chemically", and by chemically I just mean like nothing has been added. They just add the ingredients and nothing else. You may smell something every time you open the bottle, maybe if your face is close enough, but once you apply it to your skin I noticed the smell vanishes quite quickly. I read a lot of the reviews and I took a chance and I am extremely happy with this product. Even when my skin goes back to normal, I plan on using this stuff. For me this stuff worked like a miracle. Once applied definitely gives you a smoother feel to the face, but don't expect immediate results. It does go away and that dry skin will come back, but much like an ointment or medicine, you just have to keep applying it when you feel necessary. In no way shape or form am I being paid to write a good review. I just found this stuff as a new college student in a slightly new environment (same state, just different city), with skin problems, to be an amazing solution that is worth the "splurge".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great moisturizer, got it as a gift and felt in love, works wonders in my sensitive skin in the summer and still works great on the winter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lightweight yet deeply hydrating
reviews.reviewText: The Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Face Moisturizer Gel-Cream is hands down the best moisturizer I have ever used! Its lightweight yet deeply hydrating formula works wonders on my extra-dry skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and incredibly refreshed. The infusion of hyaluronic acid provides an intense boost of hydration without feeling greasy or heavy.What truly sets this moisturizer apart is its ability to outshine its more expensive competitors. I've tried high-end products, but none have delivered the same level of hydration and skin-smoothing results as Neutrogena Hydro Boost. The gel-cream texture is a dream to apply, and it absorbs quickly, making it perfect for my daily skincare routine.I can't recommend this product enough to anyone seeking a moisturizer that not only delivers exceptional hydration but also surpasses its pricier counterparts. Neutrogena Hydro Boost is a game-changer, and I'm thrilled to have discovered it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Is Neutrogena's Hydro Boost Gel-Cream Worth the Splash?
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Face Moisturizer Gel-Cream, and it's been great for keeping my face moisturized. The gel-cream texture feels light and refreshing, and it absorbs well into the skin. I've noticed an improvement in the hydration levels of my skin, and it doesn't feel greasy. However, the only downside for me is the price point. While it's an effective product, I feel that the amount you get for the price is a bit too much. Despite this, if you're looking for a reliable and effective hydrating moisturizer, the Neutrogena Hydro Boost does the job well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: product feels very light and scent free. my skin does not feel dry or tight. i have always had dry skin. works well in the winter also. i am using my second jar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this light-weight face moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: Perfection in a jar. Unscented, light weight, not greasy and effective cream for face. So happy to have found this product. Perfect replacement for the discontinued Botanic Tree face Moisturizer .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice moisturizer for winter's colder weather.
reviews.reviewText: This product is still light and easy to apply, like the lighter moisture gel by Neutrogena that I use in warm weather. But it is a bit heavier which works in cold, dry winter air. It is unscented, very absorbent and is a better alternative for my dry sensitive skin during winter months. I'm a Neutrogena fan for the quality of its products and also for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight instant moisture
reviews.reviewText: Product absorbs well, doesn’t irritate, quenches skin and retains moisture all day. Best if used after shower while pores are open

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Story:Like everyone else I am getting older and with time our skin changes, so decided to have an overhaul of make-up and skincare products. I’ve got to the stage where I find using foundation more of a highlighter of my skins faults more than anything else and so have been looking to improve the overall texture and brightness of my skin in order to negate using it. Part of my revised regime is the inclusion of hyaluronic acid containing products and this is a review of one of them.The Product:This is a 50ml pot of a lightweight and easy to disperse gel cream. It sinks in immediately leaving the skin silky smooth to the touch without greasiness. The product contains hyaluronic acid a naturally occurring molecule in body tissue, which as the years progress, decreases. Hyaluronic acid is a non-irritating skincare ingredient. It is suitable for all skin types, as all skin types need hydration, but it is especially beneficial for aging or dehydrated skin. Hyaluronic acid is an exceptional hydrator capable of holding 1000 times (one thousand) its weight in water which it draws from the atmosphere giving the skin the hydration it needs because the hyaluronan in the body is degraded and synthesised by a third every day. I use it twice a day and my skin is now beautiful and supple.The ingredients:Not all Neutrogena® Hydro Boost products are made equal. This particular item contains Methylparaben which is a type of paraben. Parabens are chemicals that are often used as preservatives to give products a longer shelf life. They’re added to food or cosmetics to prevent the growth of mould and other harmful bacteria. Methylparaben doesn’t accumulate in the body. In fact, the body flushes the chemical out quite quickly. However, if this is something you are trying to avoid you may want to bypass this.The Verdict:This is an ultra light moisturiser that absorbs quickly into the skin leaving no heaviness or greasiness. Being non-comedogenic it doesn’t block pores and is a fabulous addition to my regime; I love this. All in all this has been the right choice (for me) and I think you will like it too.The above narrative is my opinion only and does not in any way represent Neutrogena® or Amazon.If you found my review helpful, please click the ‘Helpful’ button below so I know it has been of use.

Esta crema es excelente para todo tipo de piel, incluyendo las grasas, es un mito que no ocupen crema las pieles grasas, se absorbe muy rápido, no queda pegajosa ni deja la piel tirante. Entre sus beneficios por su formulación me atrevería a decir que solo sirve para hidratar, y vaya que lo hace muy bien, sien embargo, si estas buscando una crema para arrugas, quitar granitos, etc. esta no es para ti, solo es crema hidratante.
This product really works for me! I am using it every night and my skin is very soft now! I find the price and quality very high. Definitely a must have for me.
